original_text: And if he smite him with an instrument of iron, so that he die, he is a murderer: the murderer shall surely be put to death.
korean_text: 만일 철 연장으로 사람을 쳐죽이면 그는 살인자니 그 살인자를 반드시 죽일 것이요

sentences.original_text: And if he smite him with an instrument of iron
the murderer shall surely be put to death
